General.Name: Huizhou Desay SV Automotive Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Huizhou Desay SV Automotive Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of automotive electronic products in China and internationally. It offers infotainment systems, body information and control systems, driving information display systems, intelligent driving assistance safety systems and components, etc. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Huizhou, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: No. 6, Huitai North Road, Huizhou, China

3.Name: Mr. Jian Hui  Ling
3.Title: GM of Manufacturing Center & Employee Representative Supervisor
